Verses: 1 dhevane, Ennai Viduviyum, Karththaave, Enakkuch Sagaayanseyyath Theeviriyum.
2 en Piraananai Vaangaththedugiravargal Vetki Naanuvaargalaaga; Enakkuth Theenguvarumpadi Virumbugiravargal Pinnittuth Thirumbi Lachchaiyadaivaargalaaga.
3 aa Aa, Aa Aa, Enbavargal Thaangal Adaiyum Vetkaththinaal Pinnittuppovaargalaaga.
4 ummaith Thedugira Yaavarum Ummil Magizhndhu Sandhoshappaduvaargalaaga; Umadhu Ratchippil Piriyappadugiravargal Dhevanukku Magimai Undaavadhaaga Endru Eppozhudhum Solvaargalaaga.
5 naano Sirumaiyum Elimaiyumaanavan; Dhevane, Ennidaththil Theeviramaai Vaarum: Neere En Thunaiyum Ennai Viduvikkiravarumaanavar, Karththaave, Thaamadhiyaadheyum.
